Articles.Content: There are some videos on youtube demonstrating the use of wings to spontaneously generate lift due to aerodynamic glitches, but I don\'t really know what you are asking for...

Problem is those UFO wing videos were before the stall mechanics were added, so the same craft used on say, the video Ring Wing, do Your Thing won\'t work now as it did then.

Plus there is a UFO parts pack in CaptainSlug\'s Assorted Parts thread.
